study.title: California Memorial Football Stadium Financing Model
study.description:
An interactive illustration of the Cal Memorial Football Stadium retrofit project's financing model 
 Presented to the UC Regents at the November 2014 Regents meeting

study.title: Strategic Dilemmas
study.description: An interactive strategy development exercise that was presented to the UC Berkeley Chancellor's Cabinet at the Fall 2013 Retreat

study.title: University of California Revenue and Expense Trends, FY 2008-2012
study.description:
An interactive version of a report called University of California Revenue and Expense Trends Fiscal Years 2008 through 2012 
 (which was prepared by the UC Office of the President (UCOP))

study.title: UC Berkeley Campus Budget Flows 2012-2014
study.description:
A graphic designed to:
 - Faciltate budgetary discussions among campus leaders
 - Promote a shared understanding of the campus' financial challenges

study.title: UC Berkeley Campus Scorecard Prototype
study.description:
A tool for communicating with external campus stakeholders, highlighting UC Berkeley's commitment to transparency and accountability 
 by focussing on performance with respect to resource alignment, activities in pursuit of the campus' strategic goals, and the resulting outcomes

study.title: Migratory Patterns of California Bears
study.description: An interactive graphic highlighting pathways to degrees taken by undegraduates who entered UC Berkeley in the Fall of 2007

study.title: Work Practice Apprentice
study.description: Participated in a 3-month Work Practice Apprentice program consisting of formal Zen meditation training, community service and farm work

study.title: Peace Corps Volunteer
study.description:
Directed a Ford-Foundation baseline study documenting small scale-apiculture in the Dominican Rebpulic 
 Trained secondary-school teachers in conservation/sustainability principles as part of a UNESCO Pilot Project

experience.title: Senior Analyst :: Strategic Management & Metrics Project (Operational Excellence) | Office of Planning & Analysis
experience.description:
Support for pilot units on their paths to an effective strategic management process 
 Creation of compelling interactive data visualizations that facilitate cross-campus collaboration and decision-making 
 Development of accessible, interactive graphics that enhance senior leadership's communications with external stakeholders

experience.title: Project Lead :: Student Consoidated Financial View Project (Operational Excellence)
experience.description: User-Centered Design, Data Analysis and Prototyping to provide Berkeley students with a better online view of their finances

experience.title: Senior Technical Business Analyst :: Student Systems Roadmap Project (Operational Excellence)
experience.description:
Development of assets in support of the business case to replace the campus' homegrown Student Information System: 
 -  A logical architecture model of 93 student applications and their interfaces
 - A total cost of ownership anlaysis of student information applications

experience.title: Portfolio Management Consultant :: Division of Student Affairs
experience.description:
Special projects work on behalf of the Berkeley Office of the Registrar:
 - conducting a review of campus degree audit system and providing fit-gap analysis for campus advising toolkit solution

experience.title: Data and API Analyst :: Kuali Student Software Project
experience.description:
Collaborated with sofware architects to define service programming interfaces and the data that is exchanged across those interfaces 
 Lead analyst on the design and implementation of the campus course approval system (using a release of Kuali Student software)

experience.title: IT Manager | Senior Business Analyst | Database Programmer
experience.description:
Re-engineered the business application architecture to better serve internal customers 
 Procurement and integration of enterprise loan management systems 
 Managed a team of network administrators and software developers

experience.title: Design Analyst
experience.description:
Lead business analyst on wireless billing system, debut of number portability 
 Lead designer of self-service customer web-bill 
 Information modelling and design of new products and fee structures

experience.title: Interaction Designer
experience.description:
Designed a visual Java integrated development environment (IDE) for analysts as part of a suite of rapid application development tools 
 Worked on forward-thinking dashboard design concepts for automotive industry manufacturers

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description:
Lead developer of a conference/event planning system for the Hartford Financial Services Corporation 
 Developed web design fundamentals course materials, maintained corporate intranet
